nodes.text: Star Wars: Legacy—War is the trade paperback of the Star Wars: Legacy—War comics published by Dark Horse Comics.

It's an all-out war as the Sith emperor returns from the dead-stronger, more evil, more determined, and prepared to unleash a new secret weapon upon the galaxy! Roan Fel's loyalist Imperials, the Galactic Alliance, and the Jedi are all on the defensive-reeling from the attacks by the unified Sith.
But Cade Skywalker has his own plans for this war--all this time spent running from his legacy has finally shown him that he can't run . . . and he must stand alone against Darth Krayt!
